ProductInfo.Features:

<1> Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Canon Speedlite 320EX Flash + <4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<5> Spare LP-E12 Battery for Canon + <6> Battery Charger for LP-E12 + <7> 58mm UV Filter + <8> Additional 58mm UV Filter +
<9> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <10> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <11> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <12> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<13> Xit 12" Flexible Tripod + <14> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <15> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <16> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <17> LCD Screen Protectors
